items.name: zed
items.description: Rust-based code editor with useful AI features and human collaboration as core values. Also it's really really fast.

items.name: neovim
items.description: Hyperextensible Vim-based text editor with a rich plugin ecosystem. Modern, fast, and highly customizable for developers who value efficiency.

items.name: ripgrep
items.description: Recursively searches directories for a regex pattern. Significantly faster than alternatives like grep, ag, or ack.

items.name: ghostty
items.description: A fast, feature-rich, GPU-accelerated terminal emulator focused on performance and efficiency. Built from the ground up to feel responsive.

items.name: fzf
items.description: A command-line fuzzy finder that speeds up your workflow. Search files, command history, processes, and more with blazing speed.

items.name: zoxide
items.description: A smarter cd command that remembers the directories you use most frequently. Jump anywhere in your filesystem with minimal keystrokes.

items.name: obsidian
items.description: A powerful knowledge base that works on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files. Connect ideas with linking, visualize connections, and customize with plugins.

items.name: claude
items.description: Anthropic's AI assistant focused on helpfulness, harmlessness, and honesty. Known for long context windows and thoughtful responses.

items.name: spotify
items.description: Digital music service with millions of songs, podcasts, and videos. Perfect background companion for coding sessions and deep work.

items.name: macos
items.description: Apple's desktop operating system that combines powerful technology with elegant design. Optimized for productivity with great developer tools.

items.name: raycast
items.description: Blazingly fast, extensible launcher for macOS. Quickly access apps, search the web, control your Mac, and build custom extensions to supercharge your workflow.
